[00:00.00]Jonestown (Interlude) - Post Malone
[00:12.91]Written by：Twice as Nice/Louis Bell/Post Malone
[00:25.83]Producer：Louis Bell/Post Malone/Twice As Nice
[00:38.74]It happens every time
[00:40.30]
[00:41.64]It sounds like suicide
[00:43.59]
[00:44.62]I'm hesitant
[00:45.51]
[00:46.16]But I guess I'll drink the Kool-Aid once again
[00:49.43]
[00:51.04]It happens every time

[00:55.54]

[00:38.74]每次事情都这样发生
[00:40.30]
[00:41.64]听起来像自杀那样
[00:43.59]
[00:44.62]我正在犹豫
[00:45.51]
[00:46.16]但我想 我还是会再次喝Kool-Aid酒

[00:51.04]每次事情都这样发生
